title: No Mastery token even though I got S
body: I got S on my level 6 Syndra but I didn't get my champion master token for it is this a bug?

replies.body: It looks like you already achieved level 6 last month!  In regards to level 7, an S or S+ is needed for a token.  Unfortunately, and S- will not.  We also have a [champion mastery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide for more details.  Hopefully that helps clear things up and good luck!
I didn't read the champion mastery guide properly (my bad) I know now that I need an S and not an S- thanks for clearing that up Porocles :D{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
He said he got an S, not an S-
